metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16738 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: tinc 1.0.30 through 1.0.34 has a broken authentication protocol, although there is a partial mitigation. This is fixed in 1.1. The authentication protocol allows an oracle attack that could potentially be exploited.

criterions.comment: tinc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
